spectrals.effect: Converts all cards in hand to a single random rank, but -1Hand Size.

spectrals.name: Ectoplasm
spectrals.description:
Add Negative to a random Joker, but -1Hand Size, plus another -1 hand 
size for each time Ectoplasm has been used this run, e.g. using Ectoplasm 3 
times in the same run decreases hand size by a total of 6 (1+2+3)
spectrals.effect:
Add Negative to a random Joker, but -1Hand Size, plus another -1 hand 
size for each time Ectoplasm has been used this run, e.g. using Ectoplasm 3 
times in the same run decreases hand size by a total of 6 (1+2+3)

spectrals.effect: Destroys 5 random cards in hand, but gain $20.

spectrals.name: Ankh

leaving you with two identical Jokers. (Editions are also copied, except 
Negative)

leaving you with two identical Jokers. (Editions are also copied, except

perhaps something inside is trying to break out...
